attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are no home schooling benefits for parents wanting to teach their kids at home

The government should give people on low income families benefits (earning From £0 to £20,000 per year) (around £500 to £1000 per year should be given) Everyone has the right to FREE education, that includes those who teach at home

Research suggests that parents collectively 
pay around £129 billion to put their children through state school at an average cost of £14,000 per child.  This is an increase of £40 billion in just four years and works out at around 
£1,300 per child per year, based on educating a child from five to sixteen.
